title: In line with our belief that highly motivated and
description:
In line with our belief that highly motivated and diverse employees are crucial to fostering innovation, we're hiring talented, driven, and passionate young graduates for our competitive but rewarding Graduate Trainee Programme.

To apply, click here:https://bit.ly/41XumrS

media_text.text: REGISTRARS DATA SOLUTIONS QC GREENWICH Join our Graduate Trainee Programme! Kick-start your career with hands-on experience, mentorship, and growth op- portunities in an organization with a rich history and strong corporate govern- ance. Build your future with a legacy of excellence! Key Requirements Recent graduates with strong academic background degree in any field from a Fed- eral University or any recognized university. Candidate must not be more than 26 years. Candidate must have a minimum of a Sec- ond-Class Upper division. Candidate must have completed the Na- tional Youth Service Corps NYSC. Mode of application Qualified and Interested candidates are to apply online. Click here to apply httpsdocs.google.comformsde 1FAIpQLSeDhna8aRDF5xP3D74x6pyQxplY 2rjOhFP3s5CypPITQIQVQviewform Closing Date 28th March, 2025
